Description: 
------------- 
Designed by famed RPG producer Level-5, Inazuma Eleven is an RPG with a subject of great soccer. You play as Mamoru Endou, captain of his youth football team high. Not all is well with Endou and his players, as spirits are reduced and the composition is so low that the team can not play the next game. Then one day, Shuya Gouenji, known throughout the youth soccer world as a legendary ace striker, transfers to Endou's school. Gouenji Endou convinces of returning to the field when the team prepares for a party with the Imperial Junior High, a school of their rivals. 

Inazuma Eleven features a full adventure mode event in the school located in the city. As you move around, one of his responsibilities is to explore new players, which can then be mounted on a computer. The game has over one thousand recruitable characters, each with different skills you want to make good use of ... If you can make the recruit. 

During football matches, have full control over your computer. The game uses the stylus for all controls, with the action packed soccer games (augmented with some points of view and highlights on the second screen) controlled simply touches and strokes. There are also scripts battle, where the game cuts in close and intense battles with other players or one-on-one game-with the shooter and the goalkeeper. The game also includes wireless support, allowing players to face each other or trade players with friends.
